comment.author: 33007063@N04
comment._content:
Hi, I was born and live in Bitonto, Apulia, Italy. I'm pleased to find two ancient photographs of my town in this collection. Aniway, I would make a correction.
This is Palazzo Vulpano's court ( XV sec ), from the name of the early owners. It is also called Palazzo Sylos-Labini, from the name of the new owners. It has never been called Palazzo Siro.
Kindest regards.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hi Salvatore,

Thank you for the identification. We used the captions on the labels to identify these images. The label for this image says "Pal. Siro." We will add your correction to our records.

Angie, Brooklyn Museum Archives
